product_name: REI InCamp Shelter 100 Accessory Wall - Single
long_description: REI InCamp Shelter 100 Accessory Walls add extra wind and sun protection to that shelter. The walls also help transform the REI InCamp Shelter 100 (sold separately) into a more private living space. An InCamp Shelter 100 can accommodate up to 2 Accessory Side Walls and 2 Accessory End Walls; InCamp Accessory Walls are sold individually, so you can customize coverage. Accessory End Walls include a center zipper for easy access to the shelter. Attaching REI InCamp Accessory Walls is quick and easy: Just attach each wall's perimeter pole clips.
short_description: REI InCamp Shelter 100 Accessory Walls add extra wind and sun protection to that shelter. The walls also help transform the REI InCamp Shelter 100 (sold separately) into a more private living space.
